subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Troymaine Pope ran for 181 yards and two touchdowns as Jacksonville State secured a spot in the Football Championship Subdivision championship game with a 62-10 drubbing of unseeded Sam Houston State.
snippet: Troymaine Pope ran for 181 yards and two touchdowns as Jacksonville State secured a spot in the Football Championship Subdivision championship game with a 62-10 drubbing of unseeded Sam Houston State.
